title: Active Job Board
subtitle: Job Freshness Tracking Tool
description: A dynamic job board that helps job hunters identify fresh opportunities by tracking how long each posting has been active. Features visual age indicators and automatic daily updates to reduce time wasted on stale job applications.

modalContent.detailedDescription: Developed a specialized job board application that addresses a critical pain point for job hunters - identifying fresh job opportunities versus stale postings. The application processes daily CSV updates and provides visual indicators showing how long each job has been active, helping users prioritize their application efforts on recent postings.
features: Daily CSV parsing and job data processing
Visual age indicators (0-2 days fresh, 3-6 days recent, 7-13 days old, 30+ days stale)
Automatic filtering to show only active jobs
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Real-time job count and status display
Error handling for data loading failures
outcomes: Helps job hunters avoid wasting time on stale postings
Provides immediate visual feedback on job freshness
Fully static site compatible with GitHub Pages
Mobile-responsive design for on-the-go job searching
